Uniswap

Constant Product Trading

class uniswappy.cpt.factory.UniswapFactory(name: str, address: str)

Create Uniswap liquidity pools for given token pairs

Parameters

self.namestr

Token name

self.addressstr

Token 0 name

self.exchange_from_tokendictionary

Map of tokens to exchanges

self.tokens_from_exchangedictionary

Map of exchanges to pair tokens

class uniswappy.cpt.exchg.UniswapExchange(factory_struct: FactoryData, exchg_struct: UniswapExchangeData)

Uniswap Exchange

Parameters

self.factory_structFactoryInit

Factory initialization data

self.exchg_structUniswapExchangeInit

Exchange initialization data

Quoting

class uniswappy.cpt.quote.LPQuote(quote_opposing=True)

Liquidity pool token quotes (ie, price, reserve and liquidity)

Parameters

self.quote_opposingboolean

Quote the opposing token amount by default, given LP and a token

class uniswappy.cpt.quote.IndexTokenQuote(quote_native_tokens=True)

Index token quotes

Parameters

self.quote_native_tokensboolean

Quote LP amount of base pool, otherwise quote indexed pool

Indexing

class uniswappy.cpt.index.RebaseIndexToken

Determine rebase amount of index token given a certain amount of liquidity from LP (inverse of SettlementLPToken)

class uniswappy.cpt.index.SettlementLPToken

Determine settlement amount of LP token given a certain amount of token

Tokens

class uniswappy.erc.ERC20(name: str, addr: str, decimal: int | None = None)

ERC20 token akjhsflkjbvjn cn vvk

Parameters

Token name

self.token_addrstr

Token address

self.token_totalfloat

Token holdings

class uniswappy.erc.LPERC20(name: str, addr: str)

DAOSYS ERC20 token

Token name

self.token_addrstr

Examples for Usage

For example:

>>> import lumache
>>> lumache.get_random_ingredients()
['shells', 'gorgonzola', 'parsley']
